hadith.chapterTitle: The Excellence of the Remembrance of Allah
hadith.body:
Jabir (May Allah be pleased with him) reported: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "For him who says: 'Subhan-Allahi wa bi hamdihi (Allah is free from imperfection, and I begin with praising Him, and to Him),' a palm-tree will be planted in Jannah."

[At- Tirmidhi].
- وعن جابر رضي الله عنه، عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم قال‏:‏ ‏"‏من قال‏:‏ سبحان الله وبحمده، غرست له نخلة في الجنة‏"‏‏.‏ رواه الترمذي وقال حديث حسن‏.‏
